k!�Have you seen the wyrm Tiamat?Damn, this would have been perfect timing.
1�We could have forced that lizard to fly us to the Wyrmking's side...
1�The conqueror of the skies must pay for stealing Altana's tears from her children!
1�Who am I? I could ask you the same question.
1�I see.So the Fishermen's Guild hired you to find me here.
1�I am the Mithran Tracker you seek.Shikaree Z.
1�Let me see the 3????.This seal is very familiar.I can tell you that Mithran pirates were responsible for drawing up this document.
1�It says here that the owner of this deed paid an enormous sum of money to purchase Purgonorgo Isle.
1�And then there is this scent.It speaks eloquently of the deal that took place, and of the secrets to be kept on both sides.
1�This deed takes precedence in Mithran law. I can assure you of its legality.
1�So the solution to this problem lies in discovering whether the island originally belonged to the pirates, or to the Fishermen's Guild.
1�That would rrrequire the judgment of many Mithra, however.
1�I will take this off your hands.Rrreturn to Windurst and inform the guild of my appraisal.
!!�Get out of here!Take this 3????. Head straight for the exit!
1�Get out of here! Head straight for the exit!
1�You're mine, Tiamat!
1�Hey, it's  !What are you doing in Attohwa Chasm?
1�I'm out herrre investigating the area with my sister.This land was devastated hundreds and hundreds of years ago by the Emptiness.
1�Our Mithran ancestors tried to rrrepair the damage with the help of the sleeping gods, but...
1�Because the gods weren't completely awake, they could only restore the envirrronment to this barren landscape.
1�So,  , was there something you wanted from me?
1�You came to see me on the request of the Fishermen's Guild?
1�Hmmm, the seal on this 3???? looks really familiar...Ah, now I remember! It belongs to the Mithrrran pirates!
1�From what I can tell, the owner of this deed paid a boatload of gil to the pirrrates in exchange for Purgonorgo Isle.
1�And then there is this scent.It carries the air of secrets kept, and deals forrrged.
1�That is the most important kind of contrrract among the Mithra.This deed is the real thing.
1�Which means that to solve this dilemma, you need to find out who the island originally belonged to--the pirrrates, or the Fishermen's Guild.
1�And that's no simple feat.Without talking to my sister firrrst, I can't give you a definite answer...
1�Let me take this deed off your hands.You can tell the guild that I'll look into it.
r!�T-Tiamat!?
1�You should leave now,  !Take this 3????, and head for the way out!
!!�You should leave now,  ! Head for the way out!
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, ?[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.

1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Head Wind(pt.1).Head Wind(pt.2).One Good Deed?(pt.1).One Good Deed?(pt.2).Tango with a Tracker(pt.1).Tango with a Tracker(pt.2).Requiem of Sin(pt.1).Requiem of Sin(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
